text: Soshite izen kara (Aru madīna ni)-ka o motte ite, shinkō o ukeireta-sha-tachi wa,(ijū shite) kare-ra no moto ni kita mono o aigo shi, mata kare-ra (ijū-sha 〔muhājiru〕 ) ni ataerareta (senri-hin) ni taishite mo kokoro no naka de hoshigaru koto mo naku, jibun (enjo-sha 〔ansāru〕 ) jishin ni sakinjite (kare-ra ni) ataeru. Tatoe jibun wa kyūbō shite ite mo. Mata, jibun no don'yoku o yoku osaeta-sha-tachi. Korera no mono koso shifuku o jōju suru monodearu
